version_description:
Fixed: a couple little bugs.  

If you <3 this app, please leave us a review. It makes a big difference to hear from you, thank you! 
If you have other feedback, please reach out to support@tinybop.com, anytime.

New: explore the skin we live in! 
Find out how your skin reacts to hot and cold, mosquitoes, and poison ivy, how fingernails and hair grow, and more.

Major Update!

In 3.0:
Explore the skin we live in! 
Find out how your skin reacts to hot and cold, mosquitoes, and poison ivy, how fingernails and hair grow, and more.
Cleaned up a little! Clipped nails, brushed teeth, etc...
Regularly scheduled check-up: ready for learning on iOS 11!
Updates for iOS15 and the new iPads.

This is a giant update with over 100 improvements large and small including spoken labels (in over 30 languages), a streamlined interface, new scenes, a more accurate digestive system, support for new devices, and much much more. Rebuilt for iOS 15!
